entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24 except minus 31 in low lying areas.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24 except minus 31 in low lying areas. Wind chill minus 26 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Thursday 23 February 2023
